Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'vLumCurrencyRateQuery' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[vLumCurrencyRateQuery] GO CREATE VIEW vLumCurrencyRateQuery AS SELECT t .CompanyID, t .FromCuryID, t .CuryRateType, t .CuryMultDiv, t .CuryRate, t .RateReciprocal, t .ToCuryID, t .CuryEffDate, DATEADD(DAY, - 1, ISNULL ((SELECT S.CuryEffDate FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY CompanyID, CuryRateType, FromCuryID, ToCuryID, CuryMultDiv ORDER BY CuryEffDate) row_num, CompanyID, FromCuryID, CuryRateType, CuryMultDiv, CuryRate, RateReciprocal, ToCuryID, CuryEffDate FROM CurrencyRate WHERE CompanyID = t .CompanyID AND CuryRateType = t .CuryRateType AND FromCuryID = t .FromCuryID AND ToCuryID = t .ToCuryID AND CuryMultDiv = t .CuryMultDiv) S WHERE S.row_num = t .row_num + 1), '9999/12/31')) AS EndCuryEffDate FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY CompanyID, CuryRateType, FromCuryID, ToCuryID, CuryMultDiv ORDER BY CuryEffDate) row_num, CompanyID, FromCuryID, CuryRateType, CuryMultDiv, CuryRate, RateReciprocal, ToCuryID, CuryEffDate FROM CurrencyRate) t
